subject: Question about Plus X pedals and haptic reactor
description_text:
Hello,


When buying the Plus X (
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=51288365072698
) with haptic reactor, do the motors need a different power supply or will
just connect to the control box?

Also, when buying the 3 pedals, is it possible to only buy 2 haptic
reactors (brake and throttle pedals)?

Where they will ship from? Buying from Portugal will there be any custom
taxes and/or paperwork?

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

conversations.body_text: Hi Joao Oliveira, when you purchase the Haptics Reactors  Set, it includes a free power supply and European plug. However, when purchasing haptics separately, these are not included. You can purchase three pedals and a set of two Haptic Reactors on the Haptic Reactors page. We ship from our warehouse in Germany, and Haptic Reactors are shipped from China. No additional customs taxes and/or paperwork are required.

Hello,

Thanks for the reply.

I have an additional question. What is the period of guarantee of the PlusX
pedals (and haptic reactors) and how can I use it if I need it.

I read some messages about EMI, connection and control box problems that
left me (and my friends) concerned. We are trying to decide between Simsonn
and SimJack and we are a bit divided.

Also, is there any advantage of buying 3 or 4 sets of pedals together then
buying them individually? Is there any promotion code if we buy together a
larger number of pedals?

Thanks again for the support.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

A sexta, 22/08/2025, 11:05, support@simsonn.com

Hello, purchases made through our official website come with a two-year warranty. Should any damage occur, we will arrange complimentary replacements or returns. For bulk orders, we offer an exclusive 12% discount – the more you buy, the more you save. Please feel free to contact me should you require these.

Hello,

So, me and some of my friends have decided to go with your Simsonn pedals,
while others remain undecided.

We would like to buy 3 sets of 2 Simsonn Plus X Black pedals (Throttle and
Brake) with haptics:
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedal-for-racing-simulator?variant=50932387578170

One of the sets is with Baseplate.

The order would be:

2x - Plus X P2-H2 Black
1x - Plus X P2-H2 Black with Baseplate.

The order will be to ship to Portugal - Lisbon

What would be the best offer you could give us.  How can we proceed with
the order, how long will take to ship and how can we do the payment.

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

A terça, 2/09/2025, 10:26, support@simsonn.com
